name: Loop Works
tag_list: mobile-recruitment, mobile, recruiting, wap, mobile-website, retention
overview:
Loop’s Mobile Technology Platform allow you to mobilize your brand and engage your mobile audience – anytime, anywhere.

Our platform integrates Text and Mobile Web for a complete, seamless mobile recruiting solution. We are dedicated to providing HR teams with mobile tools necessary to attract and retain top tier talent. With Operations in Chicago, Dallas and Brighton, England, Loop is the only proven global solution. Our technology is integrated with all North American and European Wireless carriers and designed to optimize content delivery to all mobile devices to help you:

Hire and retain talent through direct communication with personal mobile devices.

Seamlessly deliver tailored content and gain immediate feedback.

Take loyalty and referral programs to new levels of effectiveness.

Text “Loop” to 90206.
